product_name: C.A.M.P. Orbit Wire Bent Gate Carabiner
long_description: Rack the lightweight, compact C.A.M.P. Orbit Wire Bent Gate Carabiner on the end of a quickdraw or directly on a cam sling. Updated with a new nose and gate profile for superb clipping action. Bent gate shape enables quick clipping of the rope. Smooth gate action offers just the right amount of resistance when clipping.
short_description: Rack the lightweight, compact C.A.M.P. Orbit Wire Bent Gate Carabiner on the end of a quickdraw or directly on a cam sling.
